 Its a web application.

Russell Gold <russgold@...> wrote:
On Thu, 09 Sep 2004 15:33:04 -0000, bkhambadkone <bkhambadkone@...> wrote:
> 
> Hello,
> I'm testing an application which has a lot of Pop up windows and the
> pages refresh on selecting certain things from drop down lists, How
> can i handle these in junit.

Is this a Swing application? A web application? The answers are very
different. JUnit does not do any of these directly, but there are
extensions which can,
